about_the_game:
Tune into exploration mode right NOW with the new Bassboat Explorer Pack!
This amazing all-you-need power pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS - use your Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses. Spend your credits wisely!
* 20 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 30 DAYS OF PREMIUM ACCOUNT Enjoy thirty days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!
* 25 Marker Buoys
* 25 Storage Slots
* 1 Tackle Setups

MOTOR BOATS
* Garry Scott™ Scorpius™ Bass Boat - Length: 21,1 ft. (645 cm); Width: 6,1 ft. (187 cm); Weight: 2150 lb (975 kg); Engine: 250 hp; Echo Sounder: OEM, Pro

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* SharpCaster™ 210 SE - Length: 2.1 m; Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (24–70 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 30-72 lb (14–33 kg); Action: Fast
Reels:
* PowerGrab™ 7000 SE - Ratio: 6.5:1; Recovery: 37,4"; Capacity: mono 32 (0.5) /140, braid 30 (0.28) /250; Max Drag: 70.5 lb

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Braid 0.013" (0.32 mm) - Test: 69.4 lb (31.5 kg)
* Carolina Rig: .030"(0.75 mm); .032"(0.80 mm)
* Texas Rig: .030"(0.75 mm); .032"(0.80 mm)
* Offset Hook: #2/0; #4/0; #6/0
* Bullet Sinker: 6/7 Oz. (24 g); 1 1/4 Oz. (36 g); 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g)
* Twin Tail Spider Grub 3" (7 cm) (x2)
* Larva 3" (7.5 cm) (x2)
* Slug 4" (10 cm) (x2)
* Major Popper 2 1/2 Oz. (70 g) (x3)
* Buzzbait 1 Oz. (28 g), #5/0 (x3)

EQUIPMENT
* FishCitadel L Plus - Max Single Fish Weight: 220 Lb (100 kg); Total Fish Weight: 551 Lb (250 kg)

POND PASSES (30 days):
* Blue Crab Island

FISHING LICENSES (30 days):
* Advanced Mississippi License

MONSTER MISSIONS UNLOCK
* Saint-Croix Muskie Golem Monster
* San Joaquin Gourmet Bass Monster
* Blue Crab Island Ghost Peacock Bass Monster
detailed_description:
Tune into exploration mode right NOW with the new Bassboat Explorer Pack!
This amazing all-you-need power pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS - use your Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses. Spend your credits wisely!
* 20 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 30 DAYS OF PREMIUM ACCOUNT Enjoy thirty days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!
* 25 Marker Buoys
* 25 Storage Slots

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Don’t waste any time! Grab your Bassboat Explorer Pack and enjoy the island adventures!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
